name: Gateway Payougo Checkout
author: BusinessOne

sections.description:
A dedicated payment solution for businesses, online stores, blogs, points of sale and physical stores

Take advantage of a secure payment platform that is quick to integrate and reliable. Who will optimally collect payments for your transactions.

Start accepting payments now with a ready-to-use toolbox.

Payougo agregregate Mobile Money payment System on main Africa Operator.

Your clients will have to authenticate on the USSD portal to confirm their ongoing transactions.

The Module is free of commission on Mobile Money transactions.
Assistance and support free of charge.
It provide users a seamless, secured and simple payment experience.

With Payougo, you can cash-out, few minutes after client payment is confirmed.

About gateway Payougo :

  • “EASY INTEGRATION :” Start accepting payments when you sign up.

  • “SECURITY OF PAYMENTS :” Pre-confirmation of payments before authorization through USSD Portal

  • “MULTICHANNEL PAYMENTS :” Increase your conversion rate with the best mobile money solutions and local and international payment methods.

Contact us to open your merchant account and start offering online payments at your store
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.
1. In your WordPress Dashboard go to \”Plugins\” -> \”Add Plugin\”.
Search for \”Gateway Payougo Checkout\”.
2. Install the plugin by pressing the \”Install\” button.
Activate the plugin by pressing the \”Activate\” button.
3. Open the settings page for WooCommerce and click the \”Checkout\” tab.
Click on the sub tab for \”Payougo Checkout\”.
4. Configure your Payougo Gateway settings.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
* WordPress version 5.1.6 or greater.
* PHP version 5.2.4 or greater.
* MySQL version 5.0 or greater.

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS
* Latest WordPress version.
* PHP version 5.6 or greater.
* MySQL version 5.6 or greater.
sections.faq:
What is the cost for the gateway plugin?

This plugin is a FREE download.

Does this plugin work with credit cards or just Payougo?

This plugin supports mobile payments (Orange and MTN) using the Payougo hosted page.

Does this support Checkout with Payougo from the cart view?

Yes!

Does this support both production mode and sandbox mode for testing?

Yes it does – production and sandbox mode is driven by how you connect. You may choose to connect in either mode, and disconnect and reconnect in the other mode whenever you want.

Where can I get support or talk to other users?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the Plugin Forum.

Will this plugin work with my theme?

Yes, this plugin will work with any theme, but may require some styling to make it match nicely. If you’re

looking for a theme with built in WooCommerce integration we recommend Storefront.

Where can I request new features or report bugs?

New feature requests and bugs reports can be made in the plugin forum.

how to test before going live

If you want to test before going live, you can leave the Environment, above the button, to Sandbox.

short_description: With Payougo, easyly accept secure Orange Money & MTN Mobile Money payments from Cameroon subscribers on your web store.
